fast-policy-match.help: Enable/disable fast matching algorithm for explicit and transparent proxy policy.
fast-policy-match.name: fast-policy-match

forward-server-affinity-timeout.help: Period of time before the source IP's traffic is no longer assigned to the forwarding server (6 - 60 min, default = 30).
forward-server-affinity-timeout.name: forward-server-affinity-timeout

ldap-user-cache.help: Enable/disable LDAP user cache for explicit and transparent proxy user.
ldap-user-cache.name: ldap-user-cache

learn-client-ip.help: Enable/disable learning the client's IP address from headers.
learn-client-ip.name: learn-client-ip

options.help: Enable learning the client's IP address from headers.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable learning the client's IP address from headers.
options.name: disable

learn-client-ip-from-header.help: Learn client IP address from the specified headers.
learn-client-ip-from-header.name: learn-client-ip-from-header

options.help: Learn the client IP address from the True-Client-IP header.
options.name: true-client-ip

options.help: Learn the client IP address from the X-Real-IP header.
options.name: x-real-ip

options.help: Learn the client IP address from the X-Forwarded-For header.
options.name: x-forwarded-for

learn-client-ip-srcaddr.help: Source address name (srcaddr or srcaddr6 must be set).
learn-client-ip-srcaddr.name: learn-client-ip-srcaddr

learn-client-ip-srcaddr6.help: IPv6 Source address name (srcaddr or srcaddr6 must be set).
learn-client-ip-srcaddr6.name: learn-client-ip-srcaddr6

max-message-length.help: Maximum length of HTTP message, not including body (16 - 256 Kbytes, default = 32).
max-message-length.name: max-message-length

max-request-length.help: Maximum length of HTTP request line (2 - 64 Kbytes, default = 8).
max-request-length.name: max-request-length

max-waf-body-cache-length.help: Maximum length of HTTP messages processed by Web Application Firewall (WAF) (10 - 1024 Kbytes, default = 32).
max-waf-body-cache-length.name: max-waf-body-cache-length

proxy-fqdn.help: Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) that clients connect to (default = default.fqdn) to connect to the explicit web proxy.
proxy-fqdn.name: proxy-fqdn

src-affinity-exempt-addr.help: IPv4 source addresses to exempt proxy affinity.
src-affinity-exempt-addr.name: src-affinity-exempt-addr

src-affinity-exempt-addr6.help: IPv6 source addresses to exempt proxy affinity.
src-affinity-exempt-addr6.name: src-affinity-exempt-addr6

ssl-ca-cert.help: SSL CA certificate for SSL interception.
ssl-ca-cert.name: ssl-ca-cert

strict-web-check.help: Enable/disable strict web checking to block web sites that send incorrect headers that don't conform to HTTP 1.1.
strict-web-check.name: strict-web-check

webproxy-profile.help: Name of the web proxy profile to apply when explicit proxy traffic is allowed by default and traffic is accepted that does not match an explicit proxy policy.
webproxy-profile.name: webproxy-profile
